body_html:
It turns out that I failed to update the PyTorch to the latest version.

To update PyTorch in conda, I also need to upgrade conda version outside any conda enviroment.

conda upgrade conda

And then source the environment to run update:

conda install pytorch torchvision cuda90 -c pytorch

Now the speed is normal:

0 0:00:02.520029
1 0:00:00.000044
2 0:00:00.000028
3 0:00:00.000026
4 0:00:00.000027
5 0:00:00.000025
6 0:00:00.000025
7 0:00:00.000027
8 0:00:00.000025
9 0:00:00.000026

It turns out that I failed to update the PyTorch to the latest version.
To update PyTorch in conda, I also need to upgrade conda version outside any conda enviroment.
conda upgrade conda

And then source the environment to run update:
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda90 -c pytorch

body:
It turns out that I failed to update the PyTorch to the latest version. 

To update PyTorch in conda, I also need to upgrade conda version outside any conda enviroment. 

```
conda upgrade conda
```

And then source the environment to run update:

```
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda90 -c pytorch
```

Now the speed is normal:
```
0 0:00:02.520029
1 0:00:00.000044
2 0:00:00.000028
3 0:00:00.000026
4 0:00:00.000027
5 0:00:00.000025
6 0:00:00.000025
7 0:00:00.000027
8 0:00:00.000025
9 0:00:00.000026
```
